name: disjiminres
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))), wdisjALTV(cres(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))))
-| wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cres(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wdisjALTV(cres(c0, c2)), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))))
-| wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cres(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wdisjALTV(cres(c0, c2)), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))))

|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))))
-| wi(wdisjALTV(cres(c0, c2)), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, cres(c0, c2))))

comment: Disjointness condition for intersection with restriction. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 27-Sep-2021.)
